name: Mr.2 Bon Clay (Bentham)
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less to the bottom of its owner's deck. Then, when this battle ends, return this Character to the bottom of its owner's deck.
